original_text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him, because he gave not God the glory: and he was eaten of worms, and gave up the ghost.
korean_text: 헤롯이 영광을 하나님께로 돌리지 아니하므로 주의 사자가 곧 치니 벌레에게 먹혀 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주의 천사가 즉시 그를 쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: because he gave not God the glory
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 하나님께 영광을 돌리지 않았기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and he was eaten of worms
